questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a stage of the Brand Funnel Model?
Brand Funnel Model is useful for evaluating the strength of a brand at a given point in time.
The phases of Brand Funnel in correct order are (choose RIGHT answer):
Why is Brand Funnel useful for (choose WRONG answer)

choices.answer: To identify and compare strenghts of the brands in different stages
Help explain why a brand is better than the other one
Help identify bottlenecks that slow down the adoption of  brands.
To identify and compare weaknesses of the brands in different stages

questions.question: In Consumer Decision Journey: Brands in the initial-consideration set, can be up to 3 times more likely to be bought
Regarding Consumer Decision Journey Model: Consumers can only add brands in Active Evaluation Phase
The right order for Consumer Decision Journey is:

choices.answer: Initial Consideration, Active Evaluation, Post-Purchase, Purchase
Purchase, Initial Consideration,  Post-Purchase, Active Evaluation
Initial Consideration, Purchase, Post-Purchase, Active Evaluation
Initial Consideration, Active Evaluation, Purchase, Post-Purchase
